Another Jekyll step by step tutorial

Installation without bundler, adding a page, adding a gem based theme, converting the gem based theme to a regular theme, go back to a gem based theme, add a Gemfile for the bundler and publish website on Github.

Latest Posts

  • Welcome to Jekyll!

    You’ll find this post in your _posts directory. Go ahead and edit it and re-build the site to see your changes. You can rebuild the site in many different ways, but the most common way is to run jekyll serve, which launches a web server and auto-regenerates your site when a file is updated.

  • Welcome to Jekyll's step by step tutorial!

    Learning objectives

    Throughout each of the following steps you will see the output, are confronted with error messages, learn, what’s going on behind the scenes and see, how easy it then becomes to make it all work.
